attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to get a better understanding of the 🤡❄️Trump Administration❄️🤡 and their platform. However, the consequences were too horrifying for me to properly describe in words. Right after the app finished downloading, my phone turned black and only a picture of a ✨Cheeto ✨was seen🤮. This continued for an hour and I thought I would never get my phone back to its original condition. However, once the phone started functioning again, the app constantly made a sound painfully close to an ✨🧚🏽‍♀️auto tuned queef 🧚🏽‍♀️✨every time I tried to delete it and it wouldn’t stop😖. Eventually I destroyed my phone and now I have to get another one, so I am typing this review on my mother’s device. So, yeah, it’s like REALLY BAD.👺👺 Don’t download. 👺👺Would give negative stars if possible.💩
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: I got the app to support my mans Trump, but when I opened it, there was an image of a Cheeto sun tanning. With every click I made, the images got weirder and more disgusting until the last image scarred me. It was him. The tanning Cheeto man himself. The image alone shattered my phone and now I have to write my review from an Android. AN ANDROID.
